reviews.review_msg: Best teacher, she is so helpful especially on Vista.  You can tell you spends a good deal of time answering your questions as they are very thorough answers.

Professor Tien was an absolute delight. He taught my APSC160 class at UBC and he always made sure to go through the clicker questions afterwards (solving them) so we understood the content. The first half of the course (which he taught) was enjoyable and made sense.

Geoffrey was an absolute legend. The man gives the most in depth, comprehensive replies to every question whether it is a tough question or a simple question. He does an amazing job explaining every concept and his Clicker questions are very thought provoking.
